      • startNextListen

                                                     int type)
        Starts the listener on the "Next" button
        Parameters:
        button - the frame button on which activate the listener
        type - if 1, indicates the button belongs to a human frame, if 2, to an alien frame
        Returns:
        the activated ActionListener
